title: O Me O My
lyrics:
O me O my, O me O my
O me O my, frozen in time
O me O my
Feel that [?] grip of fear [?] around your petrified heart
Ain't no way to make you stay

You wanna run and make a brand new start

O my



Feels like everywhere you go around the globe and all the terror awaits, yeah

And now matter what you've changed, all the things and everything stays the same

O my



O me O my (O me O my), O me O my (O me O my)

O me O my, frozen in time

O me O my (O me O my)



Feels my body going numb and paranoia take control of my mind, yeah

Hit the pressure on my neck, this ain't no crocodile's tears in my eyes, no



Feels like everywhere you go around the globe and all the terror awaits, yeah

And now matter what you've changed, all the things and everything stays the same

O my



O me O my (O me O my), O me O my (O me O my)

O me O my, Strange fruits on the vine

O me O my (O me O my)



O me O my (O me O my), O me O my (O me O my)

O me O my, Blind leading to blind

O me O my (O me O my)



O me O my (O me O my), O me O my (O me O my)

O me O my, yeah
